title.narrative: USAID Partnership for Education: Evaluating Systems

description.narrative: (Ghana): USAID Partnership for Education: Evaluating Systems supports the Ministry of Education (MOE) and Ghana Education Service's (GES) literacy and numeracy activities by strengthening the monitoring and evaluation (M&E) system that assesses and reports on education achievement. Activities include strengthening the basic education M&E system, advancing the quality of basic education research, and conducting critical assessments and studies. With FY 2017 funds, the activity will implement an M&E capacity development strategy with MOE and GES; provide tools, technology, and training to improve the Education Management Information System (EMIS); support basic education sector research; and conduct midline and endline assessments of reading and math learning achievement.
